code: export var GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL='GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL';export var GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_SUCCESS='GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_SUCCESS';export var GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_FAIL='GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_FAIL';export var GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_RESET='GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_RESET';export var getProductDetail=function getProductDetail(params){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL,params:params};};export var getProductDetailSuccess=function getProductDetailSuccess(response){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_SUCCESS,response:response};};export var getProductDetailFail=function getProductDetailFail(response){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_FAIL,response:response};};export var getProductDetailReset=function getProductDetailReset(){return{type:GET_PRODUCT_DETAIL_RESET};};
